attributes.action: Add St Davids cross or the Welsh dragon to the Union Jack
attributes.additional_details: England, Scotland and Northern Ireland are all show on the Union Jack yet Wales isn't. I don't see why there is nothing on the flag as it is in the United Kingdom and has almost three times the amount of people as Northern Ireland so it is not like it is the least populated.
attributes.background: Adding St Davids cross or the Welsh dragon to the flag would have the Union Jack actually represent all four nations forming the UK

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331388
